block.touhoupixelcanteen.westlake_fish: West Lake Fish in Vinegar Gravy
block.touhoupixelcanteen.dongpo_pork: braised pork named form a chef:DongPo.
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.cooked_potato: A food made from a combination of gold carrot and cooked potatoes,this small idea may come from daily life.
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.stool: Made form wood plank, simple but durable.
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.desk: Made form wood plank, delicious dishes can be served on top.
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.unprocess_dis: This is an unfinished dish, You need to continue finish it ,than you can use it
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.dish:
This dish is very new, maybe this dish will hold delicacies from the mountains and seas,maybe this dish will only hold regular dishes
But the intention in cooking never changed！
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.cash: These cash come from human world,There is a great man who changed the world printed on the cash.
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.chili_pepper_: Wonderful seeds to grow a food that stimulates the taste buds of diners.
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.egg_wash: This is an easily obtainable ingredient, crack the egg to get start!
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.eggshell: The eggshell left behind during egg crackin.Please keep these eggshells,they are usefull!
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.boilsh_egg: Throw the eggs into the spring water and cook them thoroughly, simple ingredients can be easily processed
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.tea_egg: Tea eggs are simmered in tea, often found at breakfast stalls
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.melon_flesh: Don't tell me someone ate it with the rind on!?
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.chili_pepper: Food grown from magical seeds to tantalize diners' taste buds.
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.pickle_congee: Pickled watermelon rind congee—made with rice and the rind—is a light and delicious dish.
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.boilsh_egg_pe: Boilsh egg without eggshells, this is much better than eating with a shell
Half cut boiled egg, egg yolk is still not fully cooked
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.egg_custard:
A well-known side dish in China, stir the egg mixture evenly and join water, steam in the pot for a while and it's ready to eat!
——Why add so much water?
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.scrambled_egg: A well-known side dish in China, It is also a creation where many people try cooking for the first time.
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.rice_with_egg: A serving of raw egg on top of rice, in Lotus Land, everyone loves this food.
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.oyakodon: Simmer chicken and onion in a savory and sweet broth over low heat,Then cover it over the rice, in Lotus Land, everyone loves this food.
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.seaweed_and_e: Beat the eggs evenly and pour them into a boiling pot, then add seaweed, a soup that is easy to pick up.
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.rice_congee: Ordinary Congee cooked in mountain spring water
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.pumpkin_conge: Pumpkin is added to the congee to provide a sweetness to the congee.
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.tamago: A common appetizer in izakayas, the fresh and tender egg mixture and just the right amount of heat create this dish
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.westlake_fish: A famous dish from Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China. But this dish doesn't have a good reputation
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.dongpo_pork: belly, sweet-savory, tender named form a chef who can cook.
tooltip.touhoupixelcanteen.fired_soybean: A famous dish in Jiangsu and Zhejiang, the pork is wrapped in tofu skin and fried in an oil pan until crispy.
tooltip.farmersdelight.tomato: 颜色鲜艳的浆果，曾经还因为太鲜艳被视为“狐狸的果实”，觉得它具有剧毒，所以只用来观赏。在发现可以食用以后就开始大面积种植了。
tooltip.farmersdelight.cooking_pot:
一口可以容纳万物的煮锅。会陪伴你整个农夫生涯
tips:如果您破坏厨锅，那么厨锅内的物品不会掉落，可以保留。
tooltip.farmersdelight.onion: 人里农田产的洋葱，较为常见。
tooltip.minecraft.carrot: 人里农田产的胡萝卜，较为常见。
tooltip.minecraft.kelt: 不知道从哪里流入的外来食材，较为常见。
tooltip.minecraft.potato: 随处可见的那种普通土豆。
tooltip.minecraft.pumpkin: 人里农田产的南瓜，较为常见。
tooltip.minecraft.egg: 人里供应的鸡蛋，较为常见。
tooltip.minecraft.porkchop: 人里圈养的家猪肉，较为常见。
tooltip.minecraft.beef: 人里圈养的肉牛肉，较为常见。
tooltip.minecraft.pufferfish: 高级水产品，但体内含毒素，需小心处理。
tooltip.minecraft.honey_bottle: 能从树上蜂巢采到的野生蜂蜜，较为常见。
tooltip.minecraft.salmon: 一种高度洄游海鱼，但在幻想乡的河流湖泊可见。有点儿珍贵。
tooltip.minecraft.mushroom: 从魔法森林采回来的品相良好的蘑菇，在另外一个世界它无法人工种植，非常珍贵。
